page.title: 12HOME LIFE IN HOLBEACH DROVE
page.content: HOME LIFE IS, IN THE MAIN, QUITE BASIC ALTHOUGH AS REGARDS ENTERTAINING AT HOME, THIS IS QUITE POPULAR AMONG LOCAL PEOPLE. AS THERE ARE FEWER PLACES TO GO TO IN THE EVENINGS PEOPLE SEEM TO ENJOY COOKING MEALS FOR THEIR FRIENDS AND FAMILY AND MANY PEOPLE ARE EXPERIMENTING WITH THEIR COOKING AND TRYING CHINESE COOKERY AND OTHER TYPES OF COOKERY WITH PASTA SUCH AS LASANGE AND MOUSAKKA WHICH ONCE UPON A TIME WOULD BE UNHEARD OF IN THE AREA AND THERE WOULD ONLY BE STRAIGHT FORWARD COOKING SUCH AS ROAST BEEF AND YORKSHIRE PUDDING OR HOTPOT WITH DUMPLINGS MUCH LIKE THE NORTHERNERS. BARBECUE FOOD IS VERY POPULAR AND IN THE SUMMER ENTERTAINING IN THE GARDEN WITH A BARBECUE IS BECOMING VERY POPULAR. OF COURSE THIS WAY OF ENTERTAINING IS LESS EXPENSIVE THAN GOING OUT TO EAT.
